sqlMap.select:
select count(DISTINCT tt.employee_id) from tbl_task_target tt, tbl_employee_info tei,tbl_department_info tdi where tt.employee_id = tei.employee_id and tdi.DEPARTMENT_ID = tei.DEPARTMENT_ID
and tei.IS_ON_DUTY ='01'
date_format(tt.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#createTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d')
tt.contract_no = #contractNo:VARCHAR#
tei.BEYOND_COMPANY = #properties.companyId:VARCHAR#
tdi.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#

select task.*, employee_name, mobile from tbl_task_target task, tbl_employee_info emp where task.verify_id = emp.employee_id and task.status= #status:CHAR# and task.TASK_TYPE='2'
date_format(task.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#endTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d')
#properties.constractNoList[]#
order by end_Time desc limit 50

select count(*) from tbl_task_target where VERIFY_ID = #verifyId:VARCHAR# and TASK_TYPE ='2' and status =#status:CHAR# and date_format(CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#createTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d')

select task.*, employee_name, mobile from tbl_task_target task, tbl_employee_info emp where task.employee_id = emp.employee_id and (task.status="0" or task.status="1") and task.TASK_TYPE='2'
date_format(task.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') < date_format(#endTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and date_format(task.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#endTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d')
#properties.constractNoList[]#
order by end_Time desc limit 100

select count(*) from tbl_task_target tt,tbl_employee_info tei,tbl_department_info tdi where tt.EMPLOYEE_ID = tei.EMPLOYEE_ID and tei.DEPARTMENT_ID = tdi.DEPARTMENT_ID
date_format(tt.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#createTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d')
#properties.constractNoList[]#
(tt.status="2" or tt.status="3")
tdi.area = #properties.area:VARCHAR#

select CONTRACT_NO, count(*) taskCount from tbl_task_target where TASK_TYPE='2'
date_format(CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#createTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d')
(status="2" or status="3")
group by CONTRACT_NO

select CONTRACT_NO, count(*) taskCount from tbl_task_target where TASK_TYPE='2'
date_format(CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#createTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d')
(status="2" or status="3")
#properties.constractNoList[]#
group by CONTRACT_NO

select TASK_ID, EMPLOYEE_ID, CONTRACT_NO, TARGET_NAME, TARGET_DESC, COMPLETE_SCORE, QUALITY_SCORE, CREATE_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS, VERIFY_ID, TASK_TYPE, COMPLETE_TIME, VERIFY_NAME, REMARK, VREMARK from tbl_task_target
order by $orderByClause$

select TASK_ID, EMPLOYEE_ID, CONTRACT_NO, TARGET_NAME, TARGET_DESC, COMPLETE_SCORE, QUALITY_SCORE, CREATE_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS, VERIFY_ID, TASK_TYPE, COMPLETE_TIME, VERIFY_NAME, REMARK, VREMARK from tbl_task_target where TASK_ID = #taskId:VARCHAR#

select TASK_ID, EMPLOYEE_ID, CONTRACT_NO, TARGET_NAME, TARGET_DESC, COMPLETE_SCORE, QUALITY_SCORE, CREATE_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS, VERIFY_ID, TASK_TYPE, COMPLETE_TIME, VERIFY_NAME, REMARK, VREMARK from tbl_task_target where TASK_ID = #taskId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into tbl_task_target (TASK_ID, EMPLOYEE_ID, CONTRACT_NO, TARGET_NAME, TARGET_DESC, COMPLETE_SCORE, QUALITY_SCORE, CREATE_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS, VERIFY_ID, TASK_TYPE, COMPLETE_TIME, VERIFY_NAME, REMARK, VREMARK) values (#taskId:VARCHAR#, #employeeId:VARCHAR#, #contractNo:VARCHAR#, #targetName:VARCHAR#, #targetDesc:VARCHAR#, #completeScore:DECIMAL#, #qualityScore:DECIMAL#, #createTime:TIMESTAMP#, #beginTime:TIMESTAMP#, #endTime:TIMESTAMP#, #status:CHAR#, #verifyId:VARCHAR#, #taskType:CHAR#, #completeTime:VARCHAR#, #verifyName:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #vremark:VARCHAR#)

insert into tbl_task_target
TASK_ID
EMPLOYEE_ID
CONTRACT_NO
TARGET_NAME
TARGET_DESC
COMPLETE_SCORE
QUALITY_SCORE
CREATE_TIME
BEGIN_TIME
END_TIME
STATUS
VERIFY_ID
TASK_TYPE
COMPLETE_TIME
VERIFY_NAME
REMARK
VREMARK
)
values
#taskId:VARCHAR#
#employeeId:VARCHAR#
#contractNo:VARCHAR#
#targetName:VARCHAR#
#targetDesc:VARCHAR#
#completeScore:DECIMAL#
#qualityScore:DECIMAL#
#createTime:TIMESTAMP#
#beginTime:TIMESTAMP#
#endTime:TIMESTAMP#
#status:CHAR#
#verifyId:VARCHAR#
#taskType:CHAR#
#completeTime:VARCHAR#
#verifyName:VARCHAR#
#remark:VARCHAR#
#vremark:VARCHAR#
)
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from tbl_task_target
sqlMap.update:
update tbl_task_target
TASK_ID = #record.taskId:VARCHAR#
EMPLOYEE_ID = #record.employeeId:VARCHAR#
CONTRACT_NO = #record.contractNo:VARCHAR#
TARGET_NAME = #record.targetName:VARCHAR#
TARGET_DESC = #record.targetDesc:VARCHAR#
COMPLETE_SCORE = #record.completeScore:DECIMAL#
QUALITY_SCORE = #record.qualityScore:DECIMAL#
CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:TIMESTAMP#
BEGIN_TIME = #record.beginTime:TIMESTAMP#
END_TIME = #record.endTime:TIMESTAMP#
STATUS = #record.status:CHAR#
VERIFY_ID = #record.verifyId:VARCHAR#
TASK_TYPE = #record.taskType:CHAR#
COMPLETE_TIME = #record.completeTime:VARCHAR#
VERIFY_NAME = #record.verifyName:VARCHAR#
REMARK = #record.remark:VARCHAR#
VREMARK = #record.vremark:VARCHAR#

update tbl_task_target set TASK_ID = #record.taskId:VARCHAR#, EMPLOYEE_ID = #record.employeeId:VARCHAR#, CONTRACT_NO = #record.contractNo:VARCHAR#, TARGET_NAME = #record.targetName:VARCHAR#, TARGET_DESC = #record.targetDesc:VARCHAR#, COMPLETE_SCORE = #record.completeScore:DECIMAL#, QUALITY_SCORE = #record.qualityScore:DECIMAL#, CREATE_TIME = #record.createTime:TIMESTAMP#, BEGIN_TIME = #record.beginTime:TIMESTAMP#, END_TIME = #record.endTime:TIMESTAMP#, STATUS = #record.status:CHAR#, VERIFY_ID = #record.verifyId:VARCHAR#, TASK_TYPE = #record.taskType:CHAR#, COMPLETE_TIME = #record.completeTime:VARCHAR#, VERIFY_NAME = #record.verifyName:VARCHAR#, REMARK = #record.remark:VARCHAR#, VREMARK = #record.vremark:VARCHAR#

update tbl_task_target
EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
CONTRACT_NO = #contractNo:VARCHAR#
TARGET_NAME = #targetName:VARCHAR#
TARGET_DESC = #targetDesc:VARCHAR#
COMPLETE_SCORE = #completeScore:DECIMAL#
QUALITY_SCORE = #qualityScore:DECIMAL#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime:TIMESTAMP#
BEGIN_TIME = #beginTime:TIMESTAMP#
END_TIME = #endTime:TIMESTAMP#
STATUS = #status:CHAR#
VERIFY_ID = #verifyId:VARCHAR#
TASK_TYPE = #taskType:CHAR#
COMPLETE_TIME = #completeTime:VARCHAR#
VERIFY_NAME = #verifyName:VARCHAR#
REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#
VREMARK = #vremark:VARCHAR#
where TASK_ID = #taskId:VARCHAR#

update tbl_task_target set EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#, CONTRACT_NO = #contractNo:VARCHAR#, TARGET_NAME = #targetName:VARCHAR#, TARGET_DESC = #targetDesc:VARCHAR#, COMPLETE_SCORE = #completeScore:DECIMAL#, QUALITY_SCORE = #qualityScore:DECIMAL#, CREATE_TIME = #createTime:TIMESTAMP#, BEGIN_TIME = #beginTime:TIMESTAMP#, END_TIME = #endTime:TIMESTAMP#, STATUS = #status:CHAR#, VERIFY_ID = #verifyId:VARCHAR#, TASK_TYPE = #taskType:CHAR#, COMPLETE_TIME = #completeTime:VARCHAR#, VERIFY_NAME = #verifyName:VARCHAR#, REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#, VREMARK = #vremark:VARCHAR# where TASK_ID = #taskId:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE TASK_TYPE = '2'
EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
date_format(BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
STATUS = #status:CHAR#
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE TASK_TYPE = '3'
EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
STATUS = #status:CHAR#
and date_format(BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT task.* ,emp.employee_name FROM tbl_task_target task, tbl_employee_info emp WHERE task.TASK_TYPE = '1'
task.VERIFY_ID = #verifyId:VARCHAR#
and task.employee_id =emp.employee_id
task.STATUS = #status:CHAR#
and date_format(task.END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR# AND TASK_TYPE = '3'
and date_format(BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') > date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
STATUS = #status:CHAR#
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR# AND TASK_TYPE = '3'
and date_format(BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
STATUS = #status:CHAR#
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
date_format(CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#createTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d')
TASK_TYPE = #taskType:VARCHAR#
STATUS = #status:CHAR#
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
date_format(BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#beginTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d')
date_format(END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#endTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d')
TASK_TYPE = #taskType:VARCHAR#
STATUS = #status:CHAR#
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
date_format(CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#createTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d')
STATUS = #status:CHAR#
and TASK_TYPE in ('2','3') order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
date_format(END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= date_format(#createTime:TIMESTAMP#,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
TASK_TYPE = #taskType:VARCHAR#
STATUS = #status:CHAR#
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE TASK_TYPE = '2' and STATUS in ('2','3')
EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
date_format(CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE TASK_TYPE = '3' and STATUS in ('2','3')
EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
and date_format(BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE TASK_TYPE = '3' and STATUS in ('2','3')
EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
date_format(BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE TASK_TYPE = '2' and STATUS in ('2','3')
EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
date_format(BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE TASK_TYPE = '2' and STATUS in ('0','1')
EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
date_format(CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE TASK_TYPE = '3' and STATUS in ('0','1')
EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
and date_format(BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(sysdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE TASK_TYPE = '3' and STATUS in ('0','1')
EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
and date_format(BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
order by TASK_ID asc

SELECT * FROM tbl_task_target WHERE TASK_TYPE = '2' and STATUS in ('0','1')
EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
date_format(BEGIN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(END_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
order by TASK_ID asc

select * from tbl_task_target task where task.TASK_TYPE = '2'
date_format(task.begin_time,'%Y-%m-%d')= #properties.queryDate:VARCHAR#
#properties.employeeIdList[]#

select date_format(ts.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as taskChartDates,count(ts.create_time) as taskChartCount from tbl_task_target as ts where ts.status in (2,3)
ts.EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId:VARCHAR#
ts.CONTRACT_NO = #contractNo:VARCHAR#
date_format(ts.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')>= #properties.beginTime:VARCHAR#
date_format(ts.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')< #properties.endTime:VARCHAR#
GROUP BY date_format(ts.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY ts.create_time ASC
